trajectory.action:
Python(file_path="./plot_diabetes_proportions.py"):
```python
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Load the dataset
df = pd.read_csv('diabetes_012_health_indicators_BRFSS2015.csv')

# Count the proportions of each category in the target variable
proportions = df['Diabetes_012'].value_counts(normalize=True)

# Define labels and colors
labels = ['Healthy', 'Diabetic', 'Pre-Diabetic']
colors = ['#1f77b4', '#ff7f0e', '#2ca02c']

# Plot the pie chart
plt.figure(figsize=(8, 8))
plt.pie(proportions, labels=labels, colors=colors, autopct='%1.1f%%', startangle=140)
plt.title('Proportion of Different Diabetes States')
plt.savefig('result.png')
plt.show()
```

Action: Python(file_path="./plot_diabetes_proportions.py"):
```python
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Load the dataset
df = pd.read_csv('diabetes_012_health_indicators_BRFSS2015.csv')

# Count the proportions of each category in the target variable
proportions = df['Diabetes_012'].value_counts(normalize=True)

# Define labels and colors
labels = ['Healthy', 'Diabetic', 'Pre-Diabetic']
colors = ['#1f77b4', '#ff7f0e', '#2ca02c']

# Plot the pie chart
plt.figure(figsize=(8, 8))
plt.pie(proportions, labels=labels, colors=colors, autopct='%1.1f%%', startangle=140)
plt.title('Proportion of Different Diabetes States')
plt.savefig('result.png')
plt.show()
```
